pages.text: Once a spell is bound to an empty scroll, a Spell Scroll can be used like a temporary scepter. Right click to cast the included spell just like with a scepter. The tooltip will indicate the included spell, some important details, and how many uses are left. If used up, the scroll will dissapear.$(br2)Spells scrolls are also the method by which spells can be moved between scepters, rather than with enchanted books.
